    • Method Detail

      • addToVisibleChat

        public void addToVisibleChat(java.lang.String message,
                    java.lang.String source,
                    boolean send)
        Displays a message in the chat of the player associated with this ChatSystem.
        Parameters:
        message - The text to display
        source - The name of the player/chatroom, that sent this message
        send - If true, this message will be sent, if false, it won't be sent. It is false in case of clientside chat errors or recieved messages.

      • wisper

        public void wisper(java.lang.String player,
          java.lang.String message,
          boolean visible,
          byte type)
        Sends a PM to a player.
        Parameters:
        player - The name of the player to send the PM to
        message - The message of the PM to send to the player
        visible - If true, this PM will be show in the sender's chat.
        type - The type of the PM
